answers.answer: well, all my mum's babies were really big and for the last baby of hers (me) they brought it 2 wks early.  Have they tested you for diabetes, I know that's one reason you can have big babies, but check what size your husband was at birth, because that pretty much determines the size of your babies!

if you are 100% positive that your dates are right....DONT let them change due date too much. cause if they change your due date by 2 weeks and then take him/her 2 weeks early because of size....then the lungs are going to be 4 weeks premature....they may have to do steroid shots or a amnio before taking him/her....otherwise there may be a risk of complication. not trying to scare you....just if you KNOW your dates are right then the baby is just big or there might be alot of fluid in there.alot of it depends on YOU knowing your dates and such. talk it over in length with your doc/midwife to make sure that changing due date is a good idea. IF that is even an option. as i said i am not trying to scare you but just letting you know what could happen if dates are messed with too much even with a big baby.

well when my mom was pregnant with me she was told August 18 then october 7 then they said they didn't know and weren't giving a due date I was born sept 30 on my own. my husband was 9lbs 1 oz and I was 8lbs 4 oz. So we were both big babies
i too was born sept 30, at 8lb 9oz.

question: My midwife is thinking she is going to see if I continue to grow to fast for my due date first was 23 weeks and 25cm and now 25 weeks 29cm. has anyone else grown so fast for there fundal height and if so were you told they might change your due date or just help you go into labour early because they are thinking it will be a big baby.
title: might be getting new due date
